content.text: For the Girls' pie chart, calculate
Calculate the percentage of the Boys who achieved grades \(E, F\) or \(G\)
Calculate the percentage of students (girls and boys) who achieved grades \(A\) or \(A^*\)
How many more boys than girls achieved grades \(B,\) \(C\) or \(D?\)
Calculate an estimate of the mean time taken by these 80 girls to complete the examination
On a histogram, the height of the column for the interval \(60 < t \leqslant 80\) is \(2.8 \text{cm}\)
Calculate the heights of the other three columns
The table shows information about the times, \(t\) minutes, taken by 80 of the girls to complete their mathematics examination

table.html:
Time taken (t minutes)40 < t ≤ 6060 < t ≤ 8080 < t ≤ 120120 < t ≤ 150

content.text: The pie charts show information on the grades achieved in mathematics by the girls and boys at a school
Complete the table of values for \(y = \frac{1}{2} x^{3} + x^{2} - 7x.\)
On the grid, draw the graph of \(y = \frac{1}{2} x^{3} + x^{2} - 7x\) for \(-5 \leqslant x \leqslant 4\)
Use your graph to solve the equation \(\frac{1}{2} x^{3} + x^{2} - 7x = 2\)
By drawing a suitable tangent, calculate an estimate of the gradient of the graph where \(x\)
On the grid draw the line \(y = 10 - 5x\) for \(-2 \leqslant x \leqslant 3\)
Use your graphs to solve the equation \(\frac{1}{2} x^{3} + x^{2} - 7x = 10 - 5x.\)
Write the four missing values in the Venn diagram
attends both music and drama clubs
One of the 90 students is chosen at random
Find the probability that the student
they both attend all three clubs,
one of them attends sports club only and the other attends music club only
Two of the 90 students are chosen at random without replacement
90 students are asked which school clubs they attend
Jose has a fish tank in the shape of a cuboid measuring \(46\mathrm{cm}\) by \(24\mathrm{cm}\) by \(20\mathrm{cm}\)
Calculate the length of the diagonal shown in the diagram
Maria has a fish tank with a volume of 20 000 cm3
Write the volume of Maria's fish tank as a percentage of the volume of Jose's fish tank
Lorenzo's fish tank is mathematically similar to Jose's and double the volume
Calculate the dimensions of Lorenzo's fish tank
A sphere has a volume of \(20 000 \mathrm{~cm}^3\) . Calculate its radius
[The volume, \(V,\) of a sphere with radius \(r\) is \(V = \frac{4}{3}\pi r^3\) .]
The ratio of the area of triangle \(OXY\) to the area of triangle \(OPQ\) is  .......  : .......
In the diagram, \(OX: XP = 3:2\) and \(OY: YQ = 3:2\)
Show that the length \(CD\) of one side of the pentagon is \(8.23 \mathrm{~cm}\) correct to three significant figures
area of the pentagon \(ABCDE\) : area of the rectangle \(WXYZ\)
Give your answer in the form \(1:n\)
The vertices \(A\) , \(B\) , \(C\) , \(D\) and \(E\) of a regular pentagon lie on the circumference of a circle, centre \(O\) , radius \(7 \text{cm}\)
They also lie on the sides of a rectangle \(WXYZ\)
Write expressions, in terms of \(x\), for the dimensions of the rectangular card before the squares are removed from the corners
The diagram shows a net for an open box
Show that the volume, \(V\mathrm{cm}^3\) , of the open box is given by the formula \(\quad V = 4x^2 + 26x + 30\)
Show all your working and give your answers correct to two decimal places
Write down the length of the longest edge of the box
A rectangular piece of card has a square of side \(2\mathrm{~cm}\) removed from each corner
How long does it take light to travel from the Sun to Earth?
How long does it take light to travel from the Sun to Pluto?
Light travels at approximately 300 000 kilometres per second
One light year is the distance that light travels in one year (365 days)
How far is one light year in kilometres?
Give your answer in standard form
How many astronomical units (AU) are equal to one light year?
Distances from the Sun can be measured in astronomical units, AU
Earth is a distance of 1 AU from the Sun
The table shows distances from the Sun
